SELECT AUTH_SQ AS authSq ,MBR_SQ AS mbrSq ,MBR_ID AS mbrId ,MBR_EMAIL AS mbrEmail ,MBR_PASSWRD AS mbrPasswrd ,MBR_NM AS mbrNm ,MBR_NCKNM AS mbrNcknm ,MBR_NATN_CD AS mbrNatnCd ,MBR_BIRTH AS mbrBirth ,( CASE WHEN MBR_SEX_CD = 'MALE' THEN '남' WHEN MBR_SEX_CD = 'FEMALE' THEN '여' END ) AS mbrSexCd ,MBR_SEX_CD AS mbrSexCdChk ,MBR_HOME_ADDR AS mbrHomeAddr ,MBR_DELIVRY_ADDR AS mbrDelivryAddr ,MBR_CP_NUM AS mbrCpNum ,MBR_CP_CERT_YN AS mbrCpCertYn ,MBR_CP_CERT_DATE AS mbrCpCertDate ,REG_MBR_SQ AS regMbrSq ,DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS regDt ,UPDT_MBR_SQ AS updtMbrSq ,DATE_FORMAT(UPDT_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS updtDt ,USE_YN AS useYn ,DEL_YN AS delYn ,MBR_EML_ALARM AS mbrEmlAlarm ,MBR_CP_ALARM AS mbrCpAlarm
FROM TBL_DA_MBR_M A WHERE 1=1 AND A.MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq}
/* 회원 로그인 아이디 체크 */ SELECT COUNT(MBR_SQ) FROM TBL_DA_MBR_M WHERE MBR_ID = #{loginId}

SELECT count(*) FROM TBL_DA_MBR_M A WHERE MBR_ID = #{mbrId}
SELECT count(*) FROM TBL_DA_MBR_M A WHERE MBR_ID = #{mbrId}
